comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
comments.creator: brian@briansmith.org
comments.text: The vast majority of users do not customize their list of security modules. We should have a shortcut that avoids the need to access secmod.db in the case where the user hasn't customized his module list and we aren't using system NSS.
comments.raw_text: The vast majority of users do not customize their list of security modules. We should have a shortcut that avoids the need to access secmod.db in the case where the user hasn't customized his module list and we aren't using system NSS.
